meta_description.title: How to Mirror Android to TV (Connect Your Phone Wirelessly)

snippet.heading: How to Connect and Mirror Android to TV
snippet.title: How to Mirror Android to TV (Connect Your Phone Wirelessly)
snippet_data: Go to Settings on your phone, TV or bridge device (media streamer). ...
Enable screen mirroring on the phone and TV. ...
Search for the TV or bridge device. ...
Initiate a connect procedure, after your Android phone or tablet and TV or bridge device find and recognize each other.

meta_description.title: Cast your Android screen from the Google Home app

meta_description.text: Open the Home app and select the Chromecast device you want to use. At the bottom of the screen will be a button labeled Cast my Screen; tap it.
